description: This file defines a Message class representing a message entity in a messaging system, including fields for sender, recipient, message body, timestamp, and read status. It provides methods for serialization and deserialization from maps.

classes.name: Message
classes.description: A class representing a message with properties such as sender, recipient, body, timestamp, and read status, along with methods for converting to and from a map.

methods.name: Message.fromMap
methods.description: Factory constructor that creates a Message instance from a map.

methods.name: toMap
methods.description: Converts Message instance to a Map<String, dynamic> for serialization.
